name: Our Little Homestead Oasis
text: Sales, sales, sales!

name: Summer Gragg
text:
I was greeted when I walked in which was great! However, that was the only time I was talked to up until I got to the register. Three women working with a store that was empty besides me and my daughters. Got up to buy a pair of shoes and it came out to $43 and some change. Tried to pay with a $100 bill and was told they cannot break a $100 bill for a $43 pair of shoes. Wow! Really?! I guess cash isn’t good any more! :-/
Disappointed!

name: Amanda Foster
text:
The one standard employee in the store was nice, however, the assistant manager was extremely rude and basically told me to deal with it (because she's the assistant manager). Well, this is me dealing with it. I had a horrible experience, but the prices and sale was good. However, not good enough for me to forget an AM whose immediate response to a customer not knowing return policies is to call the police! And then have the nerve to ask if it's "ok" to hang up. Like, yeah, I'm gonna go bath salts and attack you over your $30 shoes.

Come on, it was totally a power trip because I called her out on being rude. However, I'd like to emphasize everyone else I talked to was very nice and pleasant so it seems to be a management issue more than an employee issue.

name: Nyke Came
text: She was very polite and one of the best I've dealt with. Highly recommended..

name: Khristel Arias
text: Always good prices but needs more variety specially for men

name: Jacob Evans
text: Service was awsome, but selection was limited.

name: Diane Lewis

name: Rickey Moore
text: Great service!

name: Lilith Presson
text: Frequently fond good deals, good staff.

name: Ismael Torres
text: Great selection, to bad they're closing the store

name: Kristine Fitts
text: Best small department store EVER! Beautiful apparel and accessories. Alterations are top notch should you need them. And make sure to find Carolyn Martin in shoes....she knows feet and styles like no other! David and Katie do an exceptional job keeping up to date shoes for all ages. The store is always staffed and stocked well. Great place to find gifts too. I travel 75 miles to shop here! I highly recommend Gus Mayer.

name: Richard Shack
text: Stephanie in dresses was terrific! She pulled out all sorts of good options for my daughter and helped us decide which to keep and what wasn't flattering. I liked that she gave, very politely, constructive criticism of the clothes. My daughter and I felt confident that we had successfully updated her wardrobe for going off to college at the end of the summer.

name: Steve Russell
text: The people here are very rude. There was a crazy effeminate man that came up to us who worked there and started giving one of the people in our party who had their mask off smelling perfume. Don't cry when you go out of business because of your neurotic staff.

name: Brian Spoonire
text: Features things you will not find elsewhere which make for wonderful everyday items or gifts. True to The Summits reputation, this is one of the nicer places to shop in the area. Check out their website.

name: Ashley Teague
text: Beautiful store with wonderfully curated high end selection. The shoe department is to die for! Helpful, friendly staff as well!

name: Jimmie Johnson
text: It's always great shopping at Gus Mayer!

name: Dione Hubbars
text: If you need premium shoes in Birmingham, Al.  This is your go to.

name: Cynthia Harkness
text: I like the store, but the prices appear to be from another planet.....😒

name: Juan Ramos
text: Rude employees

name: Rossie Stoops
text: This is a fancy store. I love their shoe department and their jewelry section. Only for women.

name: Nancy Davis
text: Lindsey in the shoe section was wonderful! Everyone on the floor made it a delightful Saturday!

name: Cam Kent
text: Very over-priced. No one could tell me what I needed to know about some bowls or what they were. They were also out of a lot of sizes.

text: David had a fantastic shoe department and go visit Terry at Chanel counter

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words. We are very proud of our staff throughout our store.

text: They didn't have what I was looking for but took my name and number to call me later.

name: Katherine Ward
text: Nice Dept Store at the Summit!

name: Sedrick Wells
text: I can't remember the last time I bought a suit from any where else always have what I'm looking for and the size.

resp.text: Thank you very much Sedrick! We appreciate your business and your kind words.

name: Wen Jones
text: Great store. Nice variety of suits and blazers. The owner was on point with great customer service. I was able to get suit pants altered right away. I will be back. Great prices.

resp.text: Mr. Jones you're welcome back any time. Thank you so much for your patronage

name: Michael Kilgore
text: Love this store.  I find the best style suits and casual outfits there. Shoes too. Don't forget the socks, too sharp. My wife loves the store too. I have to leave her at home because she wants to buy everything she sees for me.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Mr. Kilgore, we appreciate your kind words. 😊

name: Isaac Moore
text: The owner is always a pleasure to speak with. He is very knowledgeable and honest about fashion.

resp.text: Isaac it's always a pleasure to see you sir! Thank you for your visit and your review. Cheers!

name: Rip from Cecil
text: Went in to pick out two outfits and they had nice selections. The prices are reasonable and the store manager is hilarious. He does a great job on alterations too. Looking forward to my third time back.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Come back and see us soon.

name: Desmond Vickers
text: Nu Image is a great men's store with "dressed to impress" clothing.

resp.text: Desmond thank you for your amazing review! Care to share an impressive picture? Come back and visit soon, we've got new fashion selections arriving often.

name: DaWnyeild Bell
text: I love getting the best stylish cloths for my guy. I don't have to drive to Atlanta.....its all right here!!!!

resp.text: Correct DaWnyield! We have some premium designers based out of Atlanta who supply our shop. We drive there so you don't have to! Come back and visit any time :)

name: tonys transportation service Antonio young
text: That's the most pleasant experience I've had in a long time.....the young lady that fitted me for my suit was very very pleasing as well definitely will be returning!!!!!!

resp.text: Come see us again soon Antonio ;)

name: Dennis Jackson
text: Love the service and people

resp.text: We love it when you visit Mr. Jackson! Thank you!

name: carlos williams
text: Very friendly

resp.text: Carlos thank you for your excellent review! Come back and see us soon, new arrivals daily. :)

name: Annie Posey
text: Good

resp.text: Thank you for the review, come back and see us again soon.

name: Holly Sims
text: Always excellent customer service at this location!! The associates are very helpful and have great attitudes!

name: Kitty Cat
text:
Everyone is nice that works here but the prices aren't that great inless you go during a sale which is pretty good, but the shoes don't last long, the quality is low... But good employee's bad shoe quality.
😾😼

name: stacey hesler
text:
(Translated by Google) Reasomable

(Original)
Reasomable

name: Kaci Coker
text: Went in to purchase a wedding dress. Found one on the rack that I was going to purchase. Paid $900 towards the dress, then my husband got deployed and the wedding was cancelled, we eloped prior to deployment instead. I called to ask if I could have a store credit since the dress did not have to be ordered, it was already hanging in their store. NO. Half a store credit? NO. This was in September that I spoke with them. Now in April they call again to ask me to pay for the rest and pick my dress up. 🤦🏻‍♀️ Needless to say, I’m still out $900, and I’m not paying the additional money for a dress I won’t wear. I don’t feel this is the best way to support our military, either.

name: K Mc
text: I highly recommend this place...they are awesome! The ladies there are friendly, knowledgeable and super helpful.  We came all the way from AR to get a prom dress for my daughter and they found the perfect one.

name: Thereal Azia
text: Found my prom dress here the staff were amazing and patient I highly recommend this place

name: Brook Smith
text: Wonderful place!  Love Mrs. Dorinda and Sandy. 🥰

name: Heidi Crawhorn
text: Loved the experience that they gave my daughter..... Will post pictures after next weekend

name: Latoya Scott-Dickens
text: Well my original visit to the shop was wonderful! My baby cousin found the dress for prom so we placed a deposit to reserve the dress. Now clearly on the receipt it says all sales are final, no refunds, 30% layaway restocking fee. Well fast forward to now, all events have been canceled. She is a senior, so no need for the dress. Now I'm not a dummy, I know getting the entire deposit back is a long shot, but I figured that I would at least get half, because after all I have not purchased the dress, just made a deposit, and the dress is still at the store..right?... WRONG!  Not only am I informed of the policy of no refund and all sales being final, but I am told I can either purchase the dress, or use the store credit..that expires in 6 month!!!! I'm livid..this pandemic is beyond my control. I understand that it's a business, but how does a deposit to reserve.a dress qualify as a sale, when I do not have possession of the dress? Will not be going back .so disappointed! And I'm out of $200.

name: Ashley Newton
text: Formally Yours is such a wonderful boutique for finding the perfect dress for your special day!  My daughter found her perfect prom gown there years ago.  Today she found her perfect wedding gown.  The staff at Formally Yours knows their gowns, designers, and their clients.  They made finding the perfect gown an easy and wonderful experience!  Trust Formally Yours to find the dress of your dreams.  They make it so easy to say "yes" to a dress!!

name: Chelle T
text: We just celebrated our Mother's 70th Birthday and found this dress at Formally Yours at the last minute. The Shawl was added to cover her shoulders, but she had several geads turning in this Hunter Green Evening Grown. Thanks for making her Birthday very SPECIAL!!!

name: S and j M
text: We had an absolutely wonderful experience here! Although it was a busy day...we still were given so much attention and care. They are sweet and kind and good at their job!  My daughter’s prom dress is absolutely perfect! We won’t go anywhere else!

name: Stephany Burden
text: Everybody there is extremely nice and helpful! The bridal gowns there are amazing!  Ms. Pamela, one of the store owners has been an angel sent from heaven! She was super flexible and patient with me. She went above and beyond to make sure my wedding dress was everything I wanted for a great price!

name: Lerinda Evans
text: Took my daughter to shop for her prom dress and the experience here was amazing. The staff was very patient and so nice. I highly recommend Formally Yours to anyone. Very beautiful dresses and so many to choose from.

name: Anita Calloway
text: Oh what a wonderful experience beautiful place beautiful people it made me want to remarry again thanks for your wonderful help today ❤️😊❤️

name: Reagan Axtell
text: The most wonderful women that you will ever meet! Always super helpful, experienced staff, and very caring! They decorated for my wedding and helped me find the wedding dress of my dreams! I had the most beautiful wedding because of all of their hard work!

name: Brandon Flucker
text: Great staff and Great Customer Service and Owner

name: Gloria Jones
text: Beautiful gowns, great atmosphere. Mrs Tammy and Ms Ashley we're awesome associates.

name: Denise Allain
text: Hannah did an excellent job.  We wouldn't have made it to a dress purchase without her!

name: Sierra Skylanders
text: Amazing the lady was very helpful she definitely listened to what i wanted and we tried on about 6 or 7 dresses they unfortunately didn't have one i fell in love with but who knows you might

name: Sandy Wiggins
text: This was one of the nicest formal shop  to which I have ever been.  The Sales staff were more than helpful (They stayed after hours to help my daughter find her dress) and I want to say that they showed compassion and kindness for a child that otherwise would not have been able to afford a dress for prom.(deeply discounting a dress for another child)  I can not thank them enough for all that they did for my daughter and her friend. I highly recommend this shop  if you need a formal for bridal gown.  They go above and beyond.

name: Donna Nall
text: Excellent experience. Very helpful!

name: Jessica Miller
text: Dyed shoes for my sisters wedding. Did an amazing job and reasonably priced.

name: Lisa Wright
text: Great customer service!

name: Barbara
text: Even though the are going out of business, the store is still stocked with great selection of shoes and other items. I went in to grab one pair of shoes and left with five for me and my children. I'll keep stopping by until the store is completely closed. Plus the staff are supeer friendly and helpful of you have an questions.

name: M L
text: There are only a few Payless store still near and Homewood location is my favorite!! Hats off to the wonderful women that helped me today. It's really refreshing to experience great customer service in a world where it's becoming rare..

name: Janet Nilsen
text: Excellent customer service! Super friendly and helpful! Great deal on super comfortable shoes!

name: MeMe Tresh Johnson
text: Shopping with friend for his 1st pair of brand new shoes in such a long time. When I first met him he was sleeping in a doorway and he worked 7 days a week. Homelessness does not mean unemployed

text: I was greeted by 2 lovely ladies who welcomed me in with a southern hello, welcome & can I help you find anything. This made my day thank you isn't good enough.
